title: Polymorph
blurb: An old man on his deathbed recalls a lifetime of encounters with something that refuses to keep a single shape.
synopsis: On the edge of death, a man tries to pin down the truth behind a presence that has followed him for decades—sometimes as a stranger, sometimes as a friend, sometimes as himself.

title: Ode to the Void
blurb: A new colony world hides a prison. A policewoman follows a chain of murders into something inhuman.
synopsis: A string of brutal deaths forces an investigator to confront the colony’s founding lie: the planet was never meant to be home—it was meant to hold what couldn’t be kept on Earth.

title: A Princess in Paris
blurb: A love story amidst cruelty and destruction.
synopsis: In Nazi-occupied Paris, a teenager falls for a peculiar girl hailing from a mysterious kingdom threatened by the Germans.
